Project.gml:name: Bolivar Dam Seepage Barrier - Drilling and Grouting, Bolivar, Ohio
PBD04

BoreholeEvent.gml:description: Finished hole at 6 pm; cloudy skies, 84 degrees.

Lithology.lithDescription: Tan, dry, silty SAND with gravels and clay
Dark gray, soft to moderately hard CLAYSTONE
Shale: light gray to gray, moderately hard to soft, oily drill water, interbedded shale.
Limestone: gray, very hard, slow drilling.
Sandstone: brown to rusty brown, hard Interbedded gray clay seams.
SAND with silt, very dark gray, 5Y3/1, no effervescence.
Sandy SILT, very dark grayish brown, 2.5Y3/2
silty SAND, pale olive, 5Y6/3, well sorted, medium bedded

Water Content, Fine Fraction smaller than 4.75 mm
